attributes.action: Make the Police forces Admit that they have been prosecuting drivers unlawfully.
attributes.additional_details:
The www.bentcop.biz & www.bentcop.boards.net websites cover the details in detail. The police are avoiding admitting the truth of the matter of their  illegal activities against the drivers. 
see these other petitions that have extensive evidence. This should not even need petitioning for the government should act by law. On recieving the information in this petition even, the petitions commitee are under legal employment policy obligation to raise the matter to the Mps. even with 1 signature
attributes.background: The www.bentcop.biz & www.bentcop.boards.net websites have extensive evidence of nationwide unlawfull & illegal prosecutions against drivers. The Councils, Mps and Police are trying to avoid confronting the issue. The government must acknowledge the legal abuses against drivers across the whole UK.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
